job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* AI-Augmented Customer Resolutions: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
     * AI Training and Improvement: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
     * Cutting-Edge AI Integration: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
     * Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role, * Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
job_details.full_text:
Application Support Engineer, Trilogy (Remote) - $60,000/year USD

* AI-Augmented Customer Resolutions: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
     * AI Training and Improvement: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
     * Cutting-Edge AI Integration: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
     * Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role, * Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on using and improving existing AI systems for customer support, rather than developing new AI models or building AI-powered applications from scratch. The core tasks involve analyzing tickets, providing feedback to AI, and integrating human expertise with AI, which aligns more with an application support role augmented by AI rather than a core AI engineering role. There is no mention of core AI development, model training from scratch, or building complex AI systems, which are hallmarks of ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer profiles.

job_tasks.justification: The role requires understanding how to integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues. This implies understanding the business need for customer support and how AI can be leveraged to meet it.
job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions' directly relates to adapting or improving existing AI models, which falls under the modeling category.
job_tasks.phrase: participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies' suggests development and integration activities, which are part of software development, even if it's focused on AI tools.
job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

job_tasks.justification: Analyzing complex tickets escalated by AI systems and improving the AI system based on this analysis implies a feedback loop for system improvement and maintenance, which is related to operational aspects of AI systems.
job_tasks.phrase: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system

soft_skills.phrase: taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role
Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback
